column2: i.e. Saint Catherine's) is a small town and municipality of Finland.

column1: It is located in the Southwest Finland region and is a neighbouring town of Turku
column2: which is the capital of Southwest Finland
column3: therefore Kaarina is a part of the Greater Turku region. The municipality has a population of 34
column4: 333 (31 July 2020) and covers an area of 179.58 square kilometres (69.34 sq mi) of which 29.15 km2 (11.25 sq mi) is water. The population density is 228.37 inhabitants per square kilometre (591.5/sq mi).

column2: with a Swedish minority and e.g. a Swedish comprehensive school. Bilinguality was proposed but rejected in 2015.

column1: The famous fetish artist Tom of Finland was born in Kaarina.
Kaarina has a well known football team Kaarinan Pojat.
The municipality of Kuusisto was consolidated with Kaarina in 1946. The municipality of Piikkiö was consolidated with Kaarina on January 1
column3: Kaarina adopted the coat of arms of Piikkiö.
